name: Spectral vs. Generation [PSP]
description:
Spectral Vs. Generation is a cross over fighting game developed in 2005 by International Games System(IGS) a company based in Taiwan known mainly for their side scroll beat'em up Knights of Valor. S.V.G was based on two turn-based tactics games that took place in the same universe, Spectral Force(PS1) and Generation Of Chaos(PS2) developed by Idea Factory.

S.V.G's style seems greatly influenced by the popular air dashing fighting game Guilty Gear though it certainly has a few unique features of its own. The game originally started out in Arcades and would be ported to the Playstation 2 and Playstation Portable consoles 2 years later but was only released in Japan and Europe.
